</div></div></div></div></div><div id="criteo-tags-div" style="display: none;"></div><script>_satellite["_runScript1"](function(event, target, Promise) {
/**
 * @returns string category or product code by URL
 */
const getCategory = () => {
  var splitedURL = window.location.href.split("/");

  if (getPageType() == "PLP") {
    if (splitedURL.indexOf("category") != -1) {
      return splitedURL[splitedURL.indexOf("category") + 1].trim();
    } else if (splitedURL.indexOf("collection") != -1) {
      return (
        splitedURL[splitedURL.indexOf("collection") + 1].trim().split("?")[0] ||
        "none"
      );
    }
    return null;
  } else if (getPageType() == "PDP") {
    if (splitedURL.indexOf("product") != -1) {
      return splitedURL[splitedURL.indexOf("product") + 1].trim();
    }
  } else if (getPageType() == "SLP") {
    return "S";
  } else if (getPageType() == "Page") {
    if (splitedURL.indexOf("page") != -1) {
      return (
        splitedURL[splitedURL.indexOf("page") + 1].trim().split("?")[0] ||
        "none"
      );
    }
  }
  return "none";
};

/**
 *
 * @param parameterName string name of parameter to search
 * @returns parameter value if found or else null
 */
const getParameter = (parameterName) => {
  var params = window.location.search;
  params = params.replace("?", "").split("&");

  params = params.filter(function (p) {
    return p.includes(parameterName + "=");
  });

  return params.length > 0 ? params[0].split("=")[1] : null;
};

/**
 *
 * @returns string page type by URL
 */
const getPageType = () => {
  if (
    /category/i.test(window.location.href) ||
    /collection/i.test(window.location.href)
  ) {
    return "PLP";
  }

  if (/search/i.test(window.location.href)) {
    return "SLP";
  }

  if (/product/i.test(window.location.href)) {
    return "PDP";
  }

  if (/page/i.test(window.location.href)) {
    return "Page";
  }

  return "Home";
};

const createDigitalData = () => {
  if (typeof window.digitalData === "undefined") {
    window.digitalData = {};
  }

  if (window.digitalData) {
    if (typeof window.digitalData.storage === "undefined") {
      window.digitalData.storage = {};
      return true;
    } else {
      return true;
    }
  }
  return false;
};

const setCookie = (cname, cvalue, exdays) => {
  var d = new Date();
  d.setTime(d.getTime() + exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
  var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
  document.cookie =
    cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/;domain=.falabella.com";
};

/**
 *
 * Get cookie
 *
 * @param {String} cname Cookie Name
 * @returns {String} Cookie value
 */
const getCookie = (cname) => {
  var name = cname + "=";
  var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
  var ca = decodedCookie.split(";");
  for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
    var c = ca[i];
    while (c.charAt(0) == " ") {
      c = c.substring(1);
    }
    if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
      return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
    }
  }
  return null;
};

/**
 * eVar77
 *
 * typeahead --> eVar77
 */

var typeahead = sessionStorage.getItem("typeaheadresult");
if (typeahead && createDigitalData()) {
  try {
    digitalData.storage.typeahead = typeahead;
    sessionStorage.removeItem("typeaheadresult");
  } catch (ex) {}
}

/**
 * evar78
 * Landing Tag
 * EXP-12
 *
 * Kensho eliminated
 * refactor landing tag, eVar78 && prop31
 */
/*

var landingTag = getCookie('landingTag');
if (landingTag && createDigitalData()) {

    try {
        landingTag = atob(landingTag);
        landingTag = JSON.parse(landingTag);

        landingTag.dc = getCategory();
        landingTag.p = getParameter('sid') || getParameter('mkid') || 'none';
        landingTag.pt = getPageType();

        var img = getCookie('landingTag_img') ? atob(getCookie('landingTag_img')) : 'none';

        var tag =
            (landingTag.bu + '|' + landingTag.lc + '|' + landingTag.d + '|' +
                landingTag.dw + '|' + landingTag.pp + '|' + landingTag.y + '|' +
                landingTag.ps + '|' + landingTag.dc + '|' + landingTag.pt + '|' +
                landingTag.p + '|' + img).substring(0, 254);

        digitalData.storage.landingTag = tag;
        digitalData.storage.prop31 = tag;

        setCookie('landingTag', '', -1);
        setCookie('landingTag_img', '', -1);
    } catch (ex) {
        console.error('LandingTagError', ex);
    }

}

const getConsentValue = (value) => {
  if (value === "true") {
    return "on";
  } else if (value === "false") {
    return "off";
  } else {
    return "null";
  }
};

 * EXP-616

const consentsTag = localStorage.getItem("consentsTag");

  let tag = JSON.parse(consentsTag);

  digitalData.storage.paymentConsent =
    getConsentValue(tag.checkOne) + "|" + getConsentValue(tag.checkTwo);

  localStorage.removeItem("consentsTag");
}

});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript3"](function(event, target, Promise) {
/*************************************************************************************************************
*	Adobe Consulting Plugin: getPercentPageViewed v6.0.0
*
*	Release Date: 2021-07-26
* 
*	Arguments to Pass In:
*	@param {String} pid a variable that you want to tie the percentage of page viewed to.  This would usually be some sort of page identifier.  Defaults to the Analytics pageName OR the current URL if not set.
*	@param {Boolean} change set this equal to false if you don't want the plugin to take into consideration any changes made to the page size after its initial load.  true is the recommended/default value for this argument
*			
*	@returns {Object} 
*		An object with the following variables:
*			ppvPreviousPage = The name of the previous page viewed (Since final measurements aren't available until a NEW page loads) 
*			ppvHighestPercentViewed = The highest percent of the previous page that the visitor viewed (height-wise); in other words, what was the furthest point that the visitor scrolled down on the page
*			ppvInitialPercentViewed = The percent of the previous page that was visible when the previous page *first* loaded
*			ppvHighestPixelsSeen = The highest number of total pixels seen (height-wise) as the visitor scrolled down the previous page
*			ppvFoldsSeen = The highest number of total "page folds" seen as the visitor scrolled down the previous page (including the "top-of-page" fold)
*			ppvFoldsAvailable = The number of total "page folds" available to scroll down on the previous page 
*
*
*************************************************************************************************************/
function getPercentPageViewed(pid, change)
{
	if(pid === "-v") return {"plugin": "getPercentPageViewed", "version": "6.0.0"}
	
	window.pageName = ("undefined" !== typeof s && s.pageName) || "";
	
	window.cookieWrite=window.cookieWrite||function(k,v,e){if("string"===typeof k){g=function(){var a=window.location.hostname,b=window.location.hostname.split(".").length-1;if(a&&!/^[0-9.]+$/.test(a)){b=2<b?b:2;var c=a.lastIndexOf(".");if(0<=c){for(;0<=c&&1<b;)c=a.lastIndexOf(".",c-1),b--;c=0<c?a.substring(c):a}}return c}();v="undefined"!==typeof v?""+v:"";if(e||""===v)if(""===v&&(e=-60),"number"===typeof e){var h=new Date;h.setTime(h.getTime()+6E4*e)}else h=e;return k&&(document.cookie=encodeURIComponent(k)+"="+encodeURIComponent(v)+"; path=/;"+(e?" expires="+h.toUTCString()+";":"")+(g?" domain="+g+";":""),"undefined"!==typeof window.cookieRead)?window.cookieRead(k)===v:!1}};
	window.cookieRead=window.cookieRead||function(k){if("string"===typeof k)k=encodeURIComponent(k);else return"";var c=" "+document.cookie,b=c.indexOf(" "+k+"="),d=0>b?b:c.indexOf(";",b);return(k=0>b?"":decodeURIComponent(c.substring(b+2+k.length,0>d?c.length:d)))?k:""};
	window.p_fo=window.p_fo||function(a){window.__fo||(window.__fo={});if(window.__fo[a])return!1;window.__fo[a]={};return!0};

	function handlePPVevents()
	{
		//return nothing if ppvID hasn't been set yet. 
		if(!window.ppvID) return;

		var getValue = function( name ) {
			var r;
			try { r = Math.max( document.body[name], document.documentElement[name] ) } 
			catch(e) { 
				try { r = document.body[name] }
				catch(e) {
					try { r = document.documentElement[name] }
					catch(e) { r = 0 }
				}
			}
			return r;
		},
		//set documentHeight equal to the height (in pixels) of the entire web page
		documentHeight = Math.max( getValue( 'scrollHeight' ), getValue( 'offsetHeight' ), getValue( 'clientHeight' ) ),

		//set browserWindowHeight equal to the height (in pixels) of the browser window's visible portion
		browserWindowHeight = window.innerHeight || getValue( 'clientHeight' ),

		//set pixelsDown equal to the number of pixels that the visitor has scrolled down from the top of the page
		pixelsDown = window.pageYOffset || getValue( 'scrollTop' ),

		//set totalPixelsSeen equal to how many pixels (height-wise) that the visitor has seen of the page
		totalPixelsSeen = pixelsDown + browserWindowHeight,

		//set percentPixelsViewed equal to the % of pixels (height-wise that the visitor has seen of the page
		percentPixelsViewed = Math.min( Math.round( totalPixelsSeen / documentHeight * 100 ), 100 ),

		//set foldsSeen equal to the number of below-the-folds equivalent seen (including the top-of-page fold)
		foldsSeen = Math.floor( totalPixelsSeen / browserWindowHeight ),

		//set foldsAvailable equal to the number of below-the-folds available (including the top-of-page fold)
		foldsAvailable = Math.floor( documentHeight / browserWindowHeight ),

		cookieValue = '';

		//if the tp (totalPixels) cookie isn't set yet OR if we have a pageName change OR if a reload has taken place OR if ppvChange is true AND the page has dynamically changed its size
		if(!window.cookieRead("s_tp") || decodeURIComponent(window.cookieRead("s_ppv").split(",")[0]) !== window.ppvID || window.p_fo(window.ppvID) || (window.ppvChange == true && (window.cookieRead("s_tp") && documentHeight != window.cookieRead("s_tp"))))
		{
			//When we have a new page (or reload), set the initial pixels seen
			if(decodeURIComponent(window.cookieRead("s_ppv").split(",")[0]) !== window.ppvID || window.p_fo(window.ppvID + "1")) window.cookieWrite("s_ips", totalPixelsSeen);

			//if we're still on the same page, then the page has resized (or reloaded)
			if(window.cookieRead("s_tp") && decodeURIComponent(window.cookieRead("s_ppv").split(",")[0]) === window.ppvID)
			{
				//recalculate the initialPercentViewed and highestPercentViewed (Based off most recent screen height)
				var oldHeight = window.cookieRead("s_tp"),
					currentCookie = window.cookieRead("s_ppv"),
					currentCookieArray = currentCookie.indexOf(",") > -1 ? currentCookie.split(",") : [],
					currentPage = currentCookieArray[0] ? currentCookieArray[0] : '',
					currentHighestPixelsSeen = currentCookieArray[3] ? currentCookieArray[3] : '',
					currentInitialPixelsSeen = window.cookieRead("s_ips"),
					currentHighestPercentViewed = Math.round(currentHighestPixelsSeen / documentHeight * 100),
					currentInitialPercentViewed = Math.round(currentInitialPixelsSeen / documentHeight * 100);

				cookieValue = currentPage + "," + currentHighestPercentViewed + "," + currentInitialPercentViewed + "," + currentHighestPixelsSeen + "," + foldsSeen;
			}

			//rewrite the totalPixels cookie equal to the documentHeight
			window.cookieWrite("s_tp", documentHeight);

		}
		//if the totalPixels cookie is already set, we're on the same page as before, and the page hasn't changed its size, set cookieValue equal to the "s_ppv" cookie
		else cookieValue = window.cookieRead("s_ppv");

		//setup cookieArray equal to what's in cookieValue
		var cookieArray = (cookieValue && cookieValue.indexOf(",") > -1) ? cookieValue.split(",", 6) : [],

			//set ppvID equal to window.ppvID if it didn't already exist in the cookieValue
			ppvID = cookieArray.length > 0 ? cookieArray[0] : encodeURIComponent(window.ppvID),

			//set highestPercentViewed equal to percentPixelsViewed if it didn't already exist in the cookieValue
			highestPercentViewed = cookieArray.length > 1 ? parseInt(cookieArray[1]) : percentPixelsViewed,

			//set initialPercentViewed equal to the current value of percentPixelsViewed if initialPercentViewed hasn't been determined yet (from the cookieValue)
			initialPercentViewed = cookieArray.length > 2 ? parseInt(cookieArray[2]) : percentPixelsViewed,

			//set highestTotalPixelsSeen equal to totalPixelsSeen if it didn't already exist in the cookieValue 
			highestTotalPixelsSeen = cookieArray.length > 3 ? parseInt(cookieArray[3]) : totalPixelsSeen,

			//set highestFoldsSeen equal to foldsSeen if it didn't already exist in the cookieValue 
			highestFoldsSeen = cookieArray.length > 4 ? parseInt(cookieArray[4]) : foldsSeen,

			//set highestFoldsSeen equal to foldsSeen if it didn't already exist in the cookieValue 
			highestFoldsAvailable = cookieArray.length > 5 ? parseInt(cookieArray[5]) : foldsAvailable;

		//if we have a percentPixelsViewed value, set cookieValue equal to: 
		//1. the ppvID (pageName), 
		//2. The highest percent of pixels viewed so far on that page, 
		//3. The initial percent of pixels viewed on the page, and 
		//4. the highest number of pixels scrolled down to on that page
		//5. the highest number of "folds" scrolled down to on the page
		//6. the highest number of folds available to scroll down to
		if(percentPixelsViewed > 0)
			cookieValue = ppvID + "," + 
			(percentPixelsViewed > highestPercentViewed ? percentPixelsViewed : highestPercentViewed) + "," +
			initialPercentViewed + "," +
			(totalPixelsSeen > highestTotalPixelsSeen ? totalPixelsSeen : highestTotalPixelsSeen) + "," +
			(foldsSeen > highestFoldsSeen ? foldsSeen : highestFoldsSeen) + "," +
			(foldsAvailable > highestFoldsAvailable ? foldsAvailable : highestFoldsAvailable);
		//write the s_ppv cookie (to be extracted on the next call)
		window.cookieWrite("s_ppv", cookieValue);
	};


	//set cookieValue equal to the s_ppv cookie
	var cookieValue = window.cookieRead("s_ppv"),

		//set cookieArray equal to the items in cookieValue
		cookieArray = cookieValue.indexOf(",") > -1 ? cookieValue.split(",") : [],

		//set pid equal to window.pageName OR the URL by default	
		pid = pid ? pid : window.digitalData.page.pageName ? window.digitalData.page.pageName : document.location.href;

	//decode the first item in cookieArray (usually pageName)
	cookieArray[0] = decodeURIComponent(cookieArray[0]);

	//set window.ppvChange to true by default (useful for measuring pages that change size)
	if(typeof change === "undefined" || change == true) window.ppvChange = true;
	else window.ppvChange = false;

	//if ppvID hasn't been set yet or if it's not equal to the pid argument's value (meaning we might have a new pageName)
	if(!window.ppvID || window.ppvID !== pid)
	{
		//set ppvID equal to the pid argument value
		window.ppvID = pid;

		//blank out the s_ppv cookie
		window.cookieWrite("s_ppv", "");

		//run the handlePPVevents plugin for the first time...
		handlePPVevents();
	}

	//if we're running this for the first time and we can addEventListener(s)
	if(window.p_fo("s_gppvLoad") && window.addEventListener)
	{
		//run handlePPVEvents on load, click, scroll, and resize events
		window.addEventListener("load", handlePPVevents, false);
		window.addEventListener("click", handlePPVevents, false);
		window.addEventListener("scroll", handlePPVevents, false);
	}

	//set the return variables
	return {
		ppvPreviousPage : cookieArray[0] ? cookieArray[0] : '',
		ppvHighestPercentViewed : cookieArray[1] ? cookieArray[1] : '',
		ppvInitialPercentViewed : cookieArray[2] ? cookieArray[2] : '',
		ppvHighestPixelsSeen : cookieArray[3] ? cookieArray[3] : '',
		ppvFoldsSeen : cookieArray[4] ? cookieArray[4] : '',
		ppvFoldsAvailable : cookieArray[5] ? cookieArray[5] : ''
	}
}

/********* calling plugin and add elements to data layer**********/

var dataLimit = 5,
    dataCurrent = 0;
var dataInterval = setInterval(checkDigitalData, 1000);

function checkDigitalData() {
    if (typeof digitalData !== 'undefined') {
        main();
        clearInterval(dataInterval);
    }

    if (dataLimit < dataCurrent) {
        clearInterval(dataInterval);
    }
    dataCurrent++;
}

function modifyDigitalData(data) {
    try {
        var digitalData = window.digitalData;
        digitalData.login = data.login;
        digitalData.page.loginStatus = data.page.loginStatus;
    } catch (e) { }
}

function checkIfStoredAnalytics() {
    var localStorageAnalytics = localStorage.getItem('analyticsInfo');
    if (localStorageAnalytics) {
        try {
            modifyDigitalData(JSON.parse(localStorageAnalytics));
        } catch (e) { }
    }
}

function main() {
    if (_satellite.getVar('storageCheck')) {
        checkIfStoredAnalytics();
    }
}

const COOKIE = "KEY_EXP";

const getCookie = (cookieName) => {
  return (
    document.cookie
      .split("; ")
      .find((row) => row.startsWith(cookieName))
      ?.split("=")[1] || ""
  );
};

const keyExp = getCookie(COOKIE);
if (keyExp) {
  window.digitalData = {
    ...window.digitalData,
    expData: {
      ...window.digitalData.expData,
      eVar195: keyExp,
    },
  };
}

/**
 * eVar88, eVar 88
 * Home Tag
 * EXP-53
 * 
 */

var storageName = "hometag";
var storageImg = "hometag_img";

/**
 * 
 * @param {String} cname Cookie Name
 * @param {String} cvalue Cookie Value
 * @param {Number} exdays Expiration days
 */
function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/;domain=.falabella.com";
}

function checkIfTesting() {
    return /hometagtest=true/i.test(document.URL) || _satellite.cookie.get('hometagtest');
}
if (checkIfTesting()) {
    if (document.querySelector('.site-wrapper')) {
        document.querySelector('.site-wrapper').style.background = "green";
    }

    document.body.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
    });

}

function addHomeTagHandlers() {
    document.addEventListener('mousedown', function(event) {
        var target = event.target;
        var elementModuleWrapper = target.closest("[data-wrapper]");
        if (elementModuleWrapper) {
            var suffix = flexibleTagging(elementModuleWrapper, target, event);
            if (suffix) {
                if (checkIfTesting()) {
                    alert(suffix);
                } else {
                    setCookie(storageImg, '', -1);
                    setCookie(storageImg, btoa(suffix.i), 1);

                    delete suffix.i;

                    setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
                    setCookie(storageName, btoa(JSON.stringify(suffix)), 1);
                }
            }
        }
    })
}

function flexibleTagging(parent, clickedElement, event) {
    var elementCTA = clickedElement.closest('[data-cta]');
    var list = elementArray('[data-cta]', parent);
    if (elementCTA && parent && list.length > 0) {
        var parentDataRef = parent.dataset.wrapper.match(/(.*)-(.*)/);
        var parentIdentifier = parentDataRef ? parentDataRef[1] : "undefined";
        var parentSectionName = parentDataRef ? parentDataRef[2] : "undefined";
        var parentPositionIndex = elementArray('[data-wrapper]').filter(function(e) {
            return e.getBoundingClientRect().width > 0 && e.getBoundingClientRect().height > 0;
        }).indexOf(parent) + 3;
        var containterCTA = elementCTA.closest('[data-cont]');
        var elementOrderNumber;
        var ctaOrderNumber;
        var nodeCheckImage;
        if (containterCTA) {
            elementOrderNumber = elementArray('[data-cont]', parent).length > 0 ? elementArray('[data-cont]', parent).indexOf(containterCTA) + 1 : 1;
            ctaOrderNumber = elementArray('[data-cta]', containterCTA).indexOf(elementCTA) + 1;
            nodeCheckImage = containterCTA;
        } else {
            elementOrderNumber = elementArray('[data-cta]', parent).indexOf(elementCTA) + 1;
            ctaOrderNumber = 1;
            nodeCheckImage = elementCTA;
        }

        var imageSource = giveImageSrc(nodeCheckImage) ? giveImageSrc(nodeCheckImage) : giveImageSrc(parent);

        return {
            d: parentIdentifier,
            dw: parentSectionName,
            pp: parentPositionIndex,
            ps: elementOrderNumber,
            i: imageSource,
            y: event.pageY
        };
    }
    return false;
}

function giveImageSrc(node) {
    var nodeImageSrc = findImage(node);
    if (nodeImageSrc) {
        return nodeImageSrc;
    }
    var nodeContainer = node.closest('[data-cont]') && node.closest('[data-cont]').parentNode || node.closest('[data-wrapper]');
    if (nodeContainer) {
        var nodeContainerImageSrc = findImage(nodeContainer);
        if (nodeContainerImageSrc) {
            return findImage(nodeContainer);
        }
    }

    return "N/A";
}

function findImage(node2) {

    var pictureQuerySelector = node2.querySelector('source') || node2.closest('source') || node2.querySelector('img') || node2.closest('img');

    if (pictureQuerySelector && pictureQuerySelector.srcset) {
        return pictureQuerySelector.srcset.replace(/\s/gi, '').split(',')[0].replace(/\.webp\d+\w+/, ".webp").replace(/\?.*/, '');
    } else if (pictureQuerySelector && pictureQuerySelector.src) {
        return pictureQuerySelector.src.replace(/\s/gi, '').split(',')[0].replace(/\.webp\d+\w+/, ".webp").replace(/\?.*/, '');
    }
}

//Utility functions
function elementArray(selector, parent) {
    return [].slice.apply((parent || document).querySelectorAll(selector));
}

addHomeTagHandlers();


/**
 * eVar88 Search bar
 */

var searchInput = document.querySelector('#testId-SearchBar-Input');
var searchButton = document.querySelector('[class*="SearchBar-module_searchBtnIcon"]');

function handleSearchEvent() {
    setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
    setCookie(storageName, btoa('S|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x'), 1);
}

searchButton.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    handleSearchEvent();
});

searchInput.addEventListener('change', function(e) {
    handleSearchEvent();
});

/**
 * 
 * ShadowRoot
 */

var shadowInterval = setInterval(getShadowRoots, 1500);
var shadowIntent = 0;
var shadowLimit = 5;

function getShadowRoots() {
    var shadowRoots = [];

    document.querySelectorAll('*').forEach(function(e) {
        if (e.shadowRoot) {
            shadowRoots.push({
                shadowRoot: e.shadowRoot,
                parent: e
            });
        }
    });

    if (shadowLimit < shadowIntent) {
        clearInterval(shadowInterval);
    }

    if (shadowRoots.length > 0) {

        clearInterval(shadowInterval);
        handleShadowRoots(shadowRoots);
    }

    shadowIntent++;

}

function handleShadowRoots(shadowRoots) {

    shadowRoots.forEach(function(e) {
        e.shadowRoot.addEventListener('mousedown', function(event) {

            var tagging = flexibleTagging(event.target.closest('[data-wrapper]'), event.target, event);

            setCookie(storageImg, '', -1);
            setCookie(storageImg, btoa(tagging.i), 1);

            delete tagging.i;

            setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
            setCookie(storageName, btoa(JSON.stringify(tagging)), 1);
        });
    });

}


/* 
    START OF CROSSOVER
    Campaing?
*/
function CyberMundosStructure(parent, clickedElement) {
    var mundo = clickedElement.closest('[class*="world__1nii4"]');
    try {
        var list = elementArray('.World_world__1nii4', mundo.closest(parent.selector));
    } catch (err) {}

    if (mundo) {
        var mundoTitle = mundo.querySelector('[class*="worldTitle__Kd3VQ"]').textContent.trim();
        var mundoOrderNumber = list.indexOf(mundo) + 1;
        var clickedPod = clickedElement.closest('[class*="podAnchor"]');
        var clickedPromoPod = clickedElement.closest('[class*="podPromoContainer"]');
        var clickedAll = clickedElement.closest('[class*="showMoreDesktopOption"]');
        var clickedAllMobile = clickedElement.closest('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]');
        var clickedStopper = clickedElement.closest('[class*="WorldStopper_fbStopper"]');

        if (clickedPod) {
            var podOrder = elementArray('a', mundo).indexOf(clickedPod) + 1 - elementArray('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]', mundo).length;
            var podDetail = clickedPod.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];

            var podImg = clickedPod.querySelector('img').src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|PC" + podOrder + "|" + podOrder + "|" + podDetail + "|" + podImg;

        }
        if (clickedPromoPod) {
            var podOrder = elementArray('a', mundo).indexOf(clickedPromoPod) + 1 - elementArray('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]', mundo).length;
            var podDetail = clickedPromoPod.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/) || undefined;
            if (podDetail) {
                podDetail = podDetail[1]
            }
            var podImg = clickedPromoPod.querySelector('img').src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0];

            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|PC" + podOrder + "|" + podOrder + "|" + podDetail + "|" + podImg.replace('?', '');

        }

        if (clickedAll) {
            var allText = clickedAll.querySelector("span").innerText;
            var allOrder = elementArray('[class*="showMoreDesktopOption"]', mundo).indexOf(clickedAll) + 1;
            var allDetail = clickedAll.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|Ver todo - " + allText + "|" + allOrder + "|" + allDetail + '|.';

        }

        if (clickedAllMobile) {
            var allMobileText = clickedAllMobile.querySelector("span").innerText;
            var allMobileOrder = elementArray('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]', mundo).indexOf(clickedAllMobile) + 1;
            var allMobileDetail = clickedAllMobile.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|Ver todo - " + allMobileText + "|" + allMobileOrder + "|" + allMobileDetail + '|.';

        }

        if (clickedStopper) {
            var stopperDetail = clickedStopper.querySelector('a').href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];

            var stopperImg = clickedStopper.querySelector('img').src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|Stopper " + 1 + "|" + 1 + "|" + stopperDetail + "|" + stopperImg;

        }
    }
}

function HotProduct(parent, clickedElement) {
    var hotProductItem = clickedElement.closest('[class*="carouselStyles_carouselItemInner"]');
    var hotProductContainer = clickedElement.closest('[class*="carouselStyles_carouselStrip"]');
    if (hotProductContainer && hotProductItem) {
        //var hotProductDetail = hotProductItem.querySelector('a').href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
        var hotProductDetail = hotProductItem.parentElement.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
        var hotProductPos = elementArray('[class*="carouselStyles_carouselItemInner"]', hotProductContainer).indexOf(hotProductItem) + 1;
        var clickedElementImage = hotProductItem.querySelector("img").src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg|([^\/]+)\.svg/)[0]
        return "Lo mas Hot|1|" + hotProductDetail + "|" + hotProductPos + "|" + clickedElementImage.replace('?', '') + '|.';
    }
}

function secondLevelHandler(firstLevel, clickedElement) {
    switch (firstLevel.identifier) {
        //caselist
        //H,V, BXL, DD, PCE, M, BP, RECs, SAF,Footer
        case 'LMH':
            return HotProduct(firstLevel, clickedElement);
            break;
        case 'M':
            return CyberMundosStructure(firstLevel, clickedElement);
            break;
        default:
            break;
    }
}

function addCyberTagHandlers() {
    //S,V, BXL, DD, M, BP, RECs, SAF
    var firstLevelList = [{
        identifier: 'M',
        selector: '#fbra_browseHomeEventModule',
        prefix: 'M|'
    }, {
        identifier: 'LMH',
        selector: '#carrusel-dy',
        prefix: 'LMH|'

    }]
    document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

        var target = event.target;
        var validTopmostParent = firstLevelList.filter(function(firstLevel) {
            var possibleParent = firstLevel.selector && target.closest(firstLevel.selector);
            return possibleParent;
        })
        if (validTopmostParent.length > 0) {

            var elementModuleWrapper = target.closest(".fb-module-wrapper.fb-m-b");

            var suffix = secondLevelHandler(validTopmostParent[0], target);
            if (suffix) {
                if (elementModuleWrapper || suffix.match(/multicampanas/i) || suffix.match(/banners/i)) {
                    var elementPositionIndex = elementArray('.fb-module-wrapper', document.querySelector('.page-wrapper')).indexOf(elementModuleWrapper) + 4;
                    //localStorage.setItem('cyberString', (validTopmostParent[0].prefix + elementPositionIndex + '|' + suffix));
                    setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
                    setCookie(storageName, btoa(validTopmostParent[0].prefix + elementPositionIndex + '|' + suffix), 1);
                } else {
                    //localStorage.setItem('cyberString', (validTopmostParent[0].prefix + suffix));
                    setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
                    setCookie(storageName, btoa(validTopmostParent[0].prefix + suffix), 1);
                }
            }
        }
    })
}

addCyberTagHandlers();

/**
 * prop63
 * 
 * EXP-115
 */

var storageName = "topMenuProp";

/**
 * 
 * @param {String} cname Cookie Name
 * @param {String} cvalue Cookie Value
 * @param {Number} exdays Expiration days
 */
function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/;domain=.falabella.com";
}
/**
 * 
 * @param {Element} element 
 */
function findAnchor(element) {
    return element.tagName != 'A' ?
        element.closest('a') ? element.closest('a') : element.querySelector('a') :
        element;
}
/**
 * 
 * @param {Element} element anchor element
 * @returns {Boolean} true if out of domain
 */
function isOutOfDomain(element) {
    if (element.tagName === 'A') {
        var url = element.href;
        url = url.indexOf('?') != -1 ? url.substring(0, url.indexOf('?')) : url;
        if (/falabella.com/.test(url)) {
            return false;
        } else if (/mi-cuenta\/giftcards/.test(url)) {
            return true;
        }
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}
/**
 * 
 * @param {Element} element 
 * @returns {String} with Store Name
 */
function getStoreNameByElement(element) {
    if (element.tagName === 'A') {
        var url = element.href;
        //remove parameters
        url = url.indexOf('?') != -1 ? url.substring(0, url.indexOf('?')) : url;
        return 'Store ' + (url.includes('sodimac') ? 'Sodimac' :
            url.includes('linio') ? 'Linio' :
            url.includes('tottus') ? 'Tottus' :
            url.includes('tienda') && url.includes('falabella-') ? 'Falabella' :
            'none');
    }
    return '';
}
/**
 * 
 * @param {Event} e Event
 * @param {String} level level of event (N1, N2, etc.)
 * @param {Boolean} hardAnchor boolean to hard clicked anchor
 * @param {Boolean} isStore
 * @param {String} text string to send on tag
 */
function handleEvent(e, level, hardAnchor, isStore, text) {

    var element = findAnchor(e.target);
    if (hardAnchor && !['A', 'B'].includes(e.target.tagName)) {
        if (!(text === 'UA' && element.innerText.toUpperCase() == 'MIS CMR PUNTOS' && ['P', 'DIV'].includes(e.target.tagName))) {
            return;
        }
    }

    var obj = {
        l: level,
        n: isStore ? getStoreNameByElement(element) : text && text !== 'UA' ? text : element.innerText,
        ood: isOutOfDomain(element || e)
    };

    setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
    setCookie(storageName, btoa(JSON.stringify(obj)), 1);



    if (obj.ood && _satellite) {
        _satellite.track('OOD_CALL');
    }

}

 * N1
 */

        var searchBar = document.querySelector('#testId-SearchBar-Input');
        if (searchBar && searchBar.value.length >= 3) {
            handleEvent(e, 'N1', false, false, 'Search');
        }
    });
}

});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript12"](function(event, target, Promise) {
var dataLimit = 5,
    dataCurrent = 0;
var dataInterval = setInterval(checkDigitalData, 1000);

function checkDigitalData() {
    if (typeof digitalData !== 'undefined') {
        main();
        clearInterval(dataInterval);
    }

    if (dataLimit < dataCurrent) {
        clearInterval(dataInterval);
    }
    dataCurrent++;
}

function main() {

    document.cookie = 'dtm_appmedallia=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;';

    var newObject = {};
    if (/\/product\//.test(document.URL)) {
        var mktplaceBool = document.querySelector('.sellerInfoContainer > a') ? true : false;
        newObject = {
            'j_linea': _satellite.getVar('recs_linea'),
            'j_sublinea': _satellite.getVar('recs_sublinea'),
            'j_clase': _satellite.getVar('recs_clase'),
            'j_subclase': _satellite.getVar('recs_subclase'),
            'marketplace': mktplaceBool,
            'sku': _satellite.getVar('ecom_sku'),
            'productId': _satellite.getVar('ecom_productId')
        };
        var pdpbody = document.querySelector('.pdp-body .container');
        if (pdpbody && /uxqa=medalliadiv/i.test(document.URL)) {
            var medalliaDiv = document.createElement('div');
            medalliaDiv.classList.add('additionInformation-container')
            medalliaDiv.id = "medalliadiv";
            pdpbody.insertBefore(medalliaDiv, document.querySelector('.fa--bazaarvoice'));
        }

    }
    if (/\/category\//.test(document.URL)) {
        newObject = {
            'j_linea': _satellite.getVar('PLP_ecom_linea'),
            'j_sublinea': _satellite.getVar('PLP_ecom_sublinea')
        };
    }
    newObject.no_show = _satellite.getVar('noShow');
    digitalData.medalliaParameters = newObject;
}
});</script><script type="text/javascript" src="https://resources.digital-cloud.medallia.com/wdcus/55961/onsite/embed.js" async=""></script><img src="https://ib.adnxs.com/setuid?entity=315&amp;code=OfyhVyPqkvwBqS3n9tysiZVk1p1dFdg1xhhNztG6DB0" width="1" height="1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" style="display:none"><iframe width="1" height="1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" style="display:none" src="https://us.creativecdn.com/ig-membership?ntk=E5LWNg83f3btowKyH2ZyNxlgX08U0tHXK_PgjE7ij1mtXVZSngDBT_9vg6AfgsJUKdqqwKz1iVYaIBY74gahfc0Sc-_twXF1ZyYxX4Wn_S24hdXjhgIF3d1b-ocHcvSC"></iframe><iframe width="1" height="1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" style="display:none" src="https://us.creativecdn.com/topics-membership?ntk=gqdOcC3LozUSj9LrQlwBkLoHBQu_tptKZkvwslGVac4AM24jNB75sRaSJamwtx-Szp917bUmvS6PZhfEiwczU0TentqR6SOLLuHAlo1PSSNMk7wiW6Mq_HSPyMB19l0b"></iframe>  
<script>_satellite["_runScript13"](function(event, target, Promise) {
/**
 * EXP-53
 * HomeTag
 * 
 * cookie
 * 
 */

/**
 * 
 * @param {String} cname Cookie Name
 * @param {String} cvalue Cookie Value
 * @param {Number} exdays Expiration days
 */
function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/;domain=.falabella.com";
}

/**
 * 
 * @param {Element} element anchor element
 * @returns {Boolean} true if out of domain
 */
function isOutOfDomain(element) {
    if (element && element.tagName === 'A') {
        var url = element.href;
        url = url.indexOf('?') != -1 ? url.substring(0, url.indexOf('?')) : url;
        if (/falabella.com/.test(url)) {
            return false;
        } else if (/mi-cuenta\/giftcards/.test(url)) {
            return true;
        }
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

var storageName = 'hometag',
    storageTLM = 'topLevelMenuCoords';

var ui = {
    isSLP: function() {
        return true;
    },
    str: function str() {
        return 'T|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x';

    },
    approvedTrackClick: function approvedTrackClick(menulink) {
        var isMenuLink = false;
        if (/(ThirdLevelItems|SecondLevelItems|ToggleThirdCategories|thirdLevelMenu)/.test(menulink.className) || menulink && menulink.parentElement && /secondLevelMenu__/.test(menulink.parentElement.className) || menulink.closest('[class*="thirdLevelMenu__mobile"]')) {
            isMenuLink = true;
        }
        if (!isMenuLink)
            return;
        var finalCondition = false;
        finalCondition = isMenuLink;
        return finalCondition;
    },
    firstLevelDescription: function() {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024;
        if (ui.isSLP()) {
            var menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu__"] li');
            menuItemsArr = [].slice.apply(menuItems);
            var a = menuItemsArr.find(function(element, i) {
                if (/active/.test(element.className)) {
                    return element;
                }
            });
            return windowW ? document.querySelector('[class*="firstLevelMenu__title--active"]').textContent.trim() : a.textContent.trim();
        } else {
            return windowW ? document.querySelector("#mobile-item-".concat(ui.firstLevelPosition())).textContent.trim() : document.querySelector("#item-".concat(ui.firstLevelPosition())).textContent.trim();
        }
    },
    firstLevelPosition: function() {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024,
            index, menuItems;
        if (ui.isSLP()) {
            if (windowW) {
                index = false;
                menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu__title"]');
                menuItemsArr = [].slice.apply(menuItems);
                menuItemsArr.map(function(element, i) {
                    if (/--active/.test(element.className)) {
                        index = i;
                    }
                });
                return index;
            } else {
                index = false;
                menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu__"] li');
                menuItemsArr = [].slice.apply(menuItems);
                menuItemsArr.map(function(element, i) {
                    if (/active/.test(element.className)) {
                        index = i;
                    }
                });
                return index;
            }
        } else {
            index = false;
            var section = window.screen.width < 1024 ? document.querySelectorAll("section[class*='menuSection'] section") : document.querySelectorAll("section[class*='menuSection'] > div > section");
            section = Array.from(section);
            section.map(function(element, i) {
                if (/display/.test(element.className)) {
                    index = i;
                }
            });

            return index;
        }
    },
    secondLevelDescription: function(theParent) {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024;

        if (ui.isSLP()) {
            if (windowW) {
                return (theParent.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]') || theParent.closest('ul[class=""]').querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]')).querySelector('a').textContent.trim();
            } else {
                return theParent.querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title"]').textContent.trim();
            }

        } else {
            if (windowW) {
                return theParent.closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_detailsElementsSmallDevice"]') ? theParent.closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_detailsElementsSmallDevice"]').querySelector('a,p').textContent.trim() : theParent.closest('[class*=ThirdLevelItems_activeMobileThirdLevel]').previousSibling.querySelector('a,p').textContent.trim()
            } else {
                return theParent.querySelector('[class*="SecondLevelItems_submenuTitle"]').textContent.trim();

            }
        }
    },
    order: function order(el, type) {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024,
            thirdLevelContainer, thirdLevelLinkArr, clickedThirdLevel;
        var order = false;
        var menuLink = el;

        var columnOrder = function() {
            return windowW ? menuLink.closest("nav").querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu"]') : menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenuContainer"]').querySelectorAll('[class*="secondLevelMenu__dekstop"]');
        };
        columnOrder = [].slice.apply(columnOrder());

        if (windowW && type === "column") {

            var newMenuLink = menuLink.closest("ul:not([class])");
            var newMenuLinkArr = [].slice.apply(newMenuLink.querySelectorAll('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]'));
            return (newMenuLinkArr.indexOf(menuLink.closest('ul[class=""]').querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]')) + 1);

        }
        //desktop
        if (!windowW && type === "column") {
            return (columnOrder.indexOf(menuLink.closest('ul[class*="secondLevelMenu"]')) + 1);
        }

        //mobile
        if (windowW && type === "row") {
            if (menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title"]')) {
                return 0;
            } else {
                thirdLevelContainer = menuLink.closest('[class*="thirdLevelMenu__mobile"]');
                thirdLevelLinkArr = [].slice.apply(thirdLevelContainer.querySelectorAll('li'));
                clickedThirdLevel = menuLink.closest('li');
                return thirdLevelLinkArr.indexOf(clickedThirdLevel) + 1;

            }
        }

        if (!windowW && type === "row") {

            if (menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title"]')) {
                return 0;
            } else {
                thirdLevelContainer = menuLink.closest('ul[class*="thirdLevelMenu"]');
                thirdLevelLinkArr = [].slice.apply(thirdLevelContainer.querySelectorAll('li'));
                clickedThirdLevel = menuLink.closest('li');
                return thirdLevelLinkArr.indexOf(clickedThirdLevel) + 1;

            }
        }
        var filterColum = function() {
            if (ui.isSLP()) {
                if (windowW) {
                    var a = columnOrder.find(function(el) {
                        if (el.querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title--active"]')) {
                            return el.querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title--active"]');
                        }
                    });
                    return [].slice.apply(a.querySelectorAll('[class*="secondLevelMenu__mobile"]'));
                } else {
                    return columnOrder;
                }
            } else {
                return columnOrder;
            }
        };
        filterColum().map(function(el, i) {
            var rgx = el.textContent;

            var title = function() {
                if (ui.isSLP()) {
                    return el.innerText.split("\n", 1)[0];
                } else {
                    return el.textContent.substr(0, secondLevelDescription.length);
                }
            };

            var theParent = function() {
                if (windowW) {
                    return linkTo;
                } else {
                    if (menuLink.className.indexOf("thirdLevelMenu--link") > -1 || menuLink.className.indexOf("ThirdLevelItems_submenuElementLi") > -1) {
                        return ui.isSLP() ? menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement : menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement
                    } else {
                        return menuLink.parentElement.parentElement;
                    }
                }
            };
            var secondLevelDescription = ui.secondLevelDescription(theParent());

            if (title() === secondLevelDescription) {

                if (rgx.indexOf(menuLink.textContent.trim()) > -1) {
                    var indexColumn = i;
                    var thisSlpTitle = ui.isSLP() ? /__title/.test(menuLink.className) : /_submenuTitle/.test(menuLink.className);
                    if (thisSlpTitle) {
                        if (menuLink.textContent === el.querySelector('[class*="_submenuTitle"]').textContent) {
                            switch (type) {
                                case "column":
                                    order = indexColumn;
                                    break;
                                case "row":
                                    order = /<\/a>/.test(menuLink.outerHTML) ? indexColumn = 0 : indexColumn + 1;
                                    break;
                                default:
                                    break;
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        var isSLPListElement = ui.isSLP() ? el.querySelectorAll('li') : el.querySelectorAll("[class*=ThirdLevelItems_listElements]");
                        // var thirdLink = windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__mobile"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=thirdLevelMenu') : isSLPListElement;
                        var thirdLink = function() {
                            if (ui.isSLP()) {
                                return windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__mobile"] [class*="secondLevelMenu__content"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=thirdLevelMenu') : isSLPListElement;
                            } else {
                                // return windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_displaySubMenuMobile"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=ThirdLevelItems_activeMobileThirdLevel] li') : isSLPListElement;
                                return windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="activeMobileThirdLevel"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=ThirdLevelItems]') : isSLPListElement;
                            }
                        };
                        thirdLink = [].slice.apply(thirdLink());
                        thirdLink.map(function(el, i) {
                            if (el.textContent.trim() === menuLink.textContent.trim()) {
                                switch (type) {
                                    case "column":
                                        order = indexColumn;
                                        break;
                                    case "row":
                                        order = ui.isSLP() ? i - 1 : i + 1;
                                        break;
                                    default:
                                        break;
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        });
        return order;
    }
};

function execute() {

    var firstLevelDescription, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition,
        columnOrder, rowOrder, firstLevelCollection, linksCollection, columnCollection;

    var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024;
    var topLevelMenu = document.querySelector('[class*="hamburgerBtn"]') ? document.querySelectorAll('[class*="hamburgerBtn"]') : document.querySelectorAll('.fb-masthead__new-hamburger-menu [class*="_firstCategories"],[class*="CategoryMenuButton-module_menu-toggle-button"]');
    //var validateServer = digitalData.page.serverName;
    if (topLevelMenu.length === 0)
        return;
    document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        var menuLink = windowW ? event.target : event.target.closest('a');
        var anchorLink = menuLink ? menuLink.closest('a') || menuLink.querySelector('a') : null;

        //Triggers on Desktop
        if (menuLink && ui.approvedTrackClick(menuLink)) {
            firstLevelPosition = ui.firstLevelPosition() + 1;
            firstLevelDescription = ui.firstLevelDescription();
            var linkTo = event.target || event.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.querySelector('[class*="submenuTitleToggleActive"]');
            var theParent = function() {
                if (windowW) {
                    return linkTo;
                } else {
                    if (menuLink.className.indexOf("thirdLevelMenu--link") > -1 || menuLink.className.indexOf("ThirdLevelItems_submenuElementLi") > -1) {
                        return ui.isSLP() ? menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement : menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement
                    } else {
                        return menuLink.parentElement.parentElement;
                    }
                }
            };
            secondLevelDescription = ui.secondLevelDescription(theParent());
            thirdLevelDescription = menuLink.textContent.trim() !== "" && menuLink.textContent.trim() !== "arrow" ? menuLink.textContent.trim() : secondLevelDescription;

            columnOrder = ui.order(menuLink, 'column');
            rowOrder = ui.order(menuLink, 'row') === -1 ? 0 : ui.order(menuLink, 'row');

            if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
                setCookie(storageName, btoa(ui.str()), 1);
                //sessionStorage.setItem('cyberString', ui.str(firstLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, columnOrder, rowOrder));

            }
            setCookie(storageTLM, '', -1);
            setCookie(storageTLM, btoa(firstLevelDescription + '|' + secondLevelDescription + '|' + thirdLevelDescription + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + columnOrder + '|' + rowOrder), 1);

        }
        if (/img_banner/.test(event.target.className)) {
            firstLevelPosition = ui.firstLevelPosition();
            var topCategory = event.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.closest('[class*="submenuStage"]').querySelector('[class*="FirstLevelItems_menuElementsHover"]').textContent;
            var ImgName = event.target.src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0].replace('?', '');
            if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
                setCookie(storageName, btoa(ui.str()), 1);
            }
            setCookie(storageTLM, '', -1);
            setCookie(storageTLM, btoa(topCategory + '|' + 'B1' + '|' + ImgName + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + '50' + '|' + '1'), 1);
        }
        if (event.target.closest('[class*="CategoryMenuDesktop-module_category-content-container"],[class*="CategoryMenuMobile-module_mobile-menu-container"]')) {
            if (window.screen.width < 1024) {
                //dosomething
                if (event.target.closest('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-2"]') || event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category"]') && event.target.localName !== "svg" && !/CategoryMenuButton-module_hamburger/i.test(event.target.className)) {
                    columnCollection = [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('[data-testid="first-level-category"]').querySelectorAll('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-2"]'));
                    linksCollection = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]') ? [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]').querySelectorAll('[class*="MenuBody-module_leaf-category-item"]')) : [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-2"]').parentElement.parentElement.querySelectorAll('[class*="MenuBody-module_leaf-category-item"]'));
                    firstLevelCollection = [].slice.apply(document.querySelectorAll('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-1"]'));

                    firstLevelPosition = firstLevelCollection.indexOf(document.querySelector('[class*=AccordionContent-module_level-button-1][class*=AccordionContent-module_active]')) + 1;
                    firstLevelDescription = document.querySelector('[class*=AccordionContent-module_level-button-1][class*=AccordionContent-module_active]').innerText;
                    columnOrder = columnCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('[data-testid="first-level-category"]').querySelector('[class*=AccordionContent-module_level-button-2][class*=AccordionContent-module_active]'));
                    if (columnCollection[columnOrder] === undefined) {
                        return;
                    }

                    secondLevelDescription = columnCollection[columnOrder].innerText;
                    thirdLevelDescription = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]') ? event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category"]').innerText : columnCollection[columnOrder].innerText;
                    rowOrder = !event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]') ? 0 : linksCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category"]')) + 1;
                    if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                        setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
                        setCookie(storageName, btoa(ui.str()), 1);
                        //sessionStorage.setItem('cyberString', ui.str(firstLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, columnOrder, rowOrder));
                    }
                    setCookie(storageTLM, '', -1);
                    setCookie(storageTLM, btoa(firstLevelDescription + '|' + secondLevelDescription + '|' + thirdLevelDescription + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + columnOrder + '|' + rowOrder), 1);

                }
            } else {
                if (event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') || ('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]')) {
                    columnCollection = [].slice.apply(document.querySelectorAll('[class*="SubCategories-module_tab-container"] ul'));
                    linksCollection = [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('ul').querySelectorAll('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]'));
                    firstLevelCollection = [].slice.apply(document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="desktop-menu-category-button"]'));

                    firstLevelPosition = firstLevelCollection.indexOf(document.querySelector('[class*="CategoryMenuDesktop-module_active"]')) + 1;
                    firstLevelDescription = document.querySelector('[class*="CategoryMenuDesktop-module_active"] span').innerText;
                    columnOrder = columnCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('ul'));
                    secondLevelDescription = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') ? event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]').innerText : event.target.closest('ul').querySelector('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]').innerText;
                    thirdLevelDescription = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') ? event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]').innerText : event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]').innerText;
                    rowOrder = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') ? 0 : linksCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]')) + 1;
                    if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                        setCookie(storageName, '', -1);
                        setCookie(storageName, btoa(ui.str()), 1);
                        //sessionStorage.setItem('cyberString', ui.str(firstLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, columnOrder, rowOrder));

                    }
                    setCookie(storageTLM, '', -1);
                    setCookie(storageTLM, btoa(firstLevelDescription + '|' + secondLevelDescription + '|' + thirdLevelDescription + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + columnOrder + '|' + rowOrder), 1);
                }

            }
        }

        if (menuLink && windowW && !ui.approvedTrackClick(menuLink) && (menuLink.closest('li[class*="MenuUtils"]') || menuLink.querySelector('li[class*="MenuUtils"]'))) {

            var listElement = menuLink.closest('li[class*="MenuUtils"]') || menuLink.querySelector('li[class*="MenuUtils"]');
            var menuItems = Array.from(listElement.closest('ul').querySelectorAll('li[class*="MenuUtils"]'));
            var menuDescription = listElement.innerText.trim().replace(/\r?\n|\r/g, ' ');
            menuDescription = menuDescription.startsWith('Tienes') ? 'Mis CMR puntos' : menuDescription;

            setCookie(storageTLM, '', -1);
            setCookie(storageTLM, btoa(menuDescription + '|' + menuDescription + '|' + menuDescription + '|' + 'H' + (menuItems.indexOf(listElement) + 1) + '|0|0'), 1);
        }

        if (_satellite && _satellite.cookie.get(storageTLM) && isOutOfDomain(anchorLink)) {
            _satellite.track('OOD_CALL');
        }
    });
}

try {
    execute();
} catch (ex) {}

const createQueueClient = (client) => {

    const tries = 60;
    let current = 0;

    const interval = setInterval(() => {
        if (typeof queueClient !== 'undefined') {
            new queueClient('falabella', client);
            clearInterval(interval);
        }
        if (tries < current) {
            clearInterval(interval);
        }
        current++;
    }, 100);
}

createQueueClient('cd2022faclhome');
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript15"](function(event, target, Promise) {
const cookiesArr = ['SHOP_THE_LOOK', 'PRICE_PAYMENT', 'PHOTOSLURP', 'FORCE_GUEST_REGISTRATION', 'GUEST_FREE', 'CMR_RR', 'HIDE_SHIPPING_WARNING', 'FIT_EXPERIMENT'];
const domains = ['www.falabella.com', '.falabella.com'];

const setCookie = (cname, cvalue, exdays, domain) => {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/;domain=" + domain;
};


cookiesArr.forEach(c => {
    domains.forEach(d => {
        if (_satellite.cookie.get(c)) {
            setCookie(c, '', -1, d);
        }
    });
});

setCookie('EXP_CC2', 'ENABLED', 60, '.falabella.com');
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript16"](function(event, target, Promise) {
const COOKIE = "KEY_EXP";

const cleanUp = ["754", "774", "766", "723", "776", "735", "743", "799", "704", "819", "800", "789", "823", "812", "811", "764",
    "793", "715", "824", "823", "756", "844", "818", "849", "834", "842", "848", "873", "837", "846", "882", "885", "876",
    "884", "867", "841", "878", "886", "875", '887', '900', '899', '898', '859', '889', '877', '869', '901', '905', '868'];

const cookies = ["SISLEVEL2_HEADER_AB"];

const getCookie = (cookieName) => {
  return (
    document.cookie
      .split("; ")
      .find((row) => row.startsWith(cookieName))
      ?.split("=")[1] || ""
  );
};

const setCookie = (cname, cvalue, exdays) => {
  let expires = "";
  if (exdays) {
    const d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
    expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
  }
  document.cookie =
    cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/;domain=.falabella.com";
};
const keyExp = getCookie(COOKIE);
if (keyExp) {
  cleanUp.forEach((c) => {
    if (keyExp.startsWith(c)) {
      setCookie(COOKIE, "", -1);
    }
  });
}

cookies.forEach((c) => {
  setCookie(c, "", -1);
});

});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript17"](function(event, target, Promise) {
var searchSelector = 'input[class*="SearchBar"]';
var resultAreaSelector = 'div[class*="SearchList-module_searchResults"]';
var sessionStorageName = 'typeaheadresult';

function handleEvent(el) {

    var sectionText;
    var section = el.closest('section');

    var greenResult;
    var pickedElementText = el.innerText;

    var searchTerm = document.querySelector(searchSelector);


    try {
        sectionText = section.querySelector('h6').innerText
    } catch (e) {
        sectionText = 'keyword';
        greenResult = 'en negro';
    }

    var options = section.querySelector('ul').childNodes;

    var index = getIndex(el, options);

    /**
     * When index is Not a Number, the result is inside green section
     */
    if (isNaN(index)) {
        options.forEach(function(e) {
            var ul = e.querySelector('ul');
            if (ul) {
                pickedElementText = ul.parentNode.querySelector('a').innerText;
                options = ul.childNodes;
                index = getIndex(el, options);
                greenResult = 'en verde';
            }
        });
    }
    sessionStorage.setItem(sessionStorageName,
        searchTerm.value + '|' + sectionText + '|' + pickedElementText + '|' + index + '/' + options.length + (greenResult ? '|' + greenResult : '')
    );
}

function getIndex(element, list) {
    var index;
    list.forEach(function(e, i) {
        if (e.querySelector('a').href == element.href) {
            index = i;
        }
    });
    return index + 1;
}


function execute() {
    try {
        var current = 0,
            tries = 100;
        var resultArea;

        var interval = setInterval(function() {

            resultArea = document.querySelector(resultAreaSelector);

            if (resultArea) {
                var links = resultArea.querySelectorAll('a');

                links.forEach(function(l) {
                    l.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        handleEvent(l);
                    });
                });
                clearInterval(interval);
            }


            if (tries < current) {
                clearInterval(interval);
            }

            current++;
        }, 50);
    } catch (ex) {}
}


document.addEventListener('click', function() {
    execute();
});

var inputBar = document.querySelector('#testId-SearchBar-Input');
if (inputBar) {
    inputBar.addEventListener('change', function() {
        execute();
    });
}
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript18"](function(event, target, Promise) {
